<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Utility class for integer operators which may exhibit overflow - Add, Sub,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Mul, and Shl. It does not include SDiv, despite that operator having the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// potential for overflow.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instruction::FPTrunc:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instruction::FPExt:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: To clean up and correct the semantics of fast-math-flags, FCmp</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        should not be treated as a math op, but the other opcodes should.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        This would make things consistent with Select/PHI (FP value type</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        determines whether they are math ops and, therefore, capable of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        having fast-math-flags).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instruction::FCmp:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instruction::PHI:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instruction::Select:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instruction::Call: &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fpmathoperator/#ac4f7d12f6bda5a60f868f3ec8be99f9c">isSupportedFloatingPointType</a>(V-&gt;getType());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Accumulate the constant address offset of this GEP if possible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This routine accepts an APInt into which it will try to accumulate the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// constant offset of this GEP.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If \\p ExternalAnalysis is provided it will be used to calculate a offset</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// when a operand of GEP is not constant.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// For example, for a value \\p ExternalAnalysis might try to calculate a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// lower bound. If \\p ExternalAnalysis is successful, it should return true.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If the \\p ExternalAnalysis returns false or the value returned by \\p</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// ExternalAnalysis results in a overflow/underflow, this routine returns</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// false and the value of the offset APInt is undefined (it is &#42;not&#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// preserved!).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The APInt passed into this routine must be at exactly as wide as the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// IntPtr type for the address space of the base GEP pointer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gepoperator/#a5c00e7e76ef5e98c6ffec8d31f63970a">accumulateConstantOffset</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"></CodeLine>
